content: Ok, so you skipped a step. The current cache needs to be understood and then completely redone, because it's kind of all over the place right now. There are 2 original files and the other 4 files were just kind of thrown in there as we went and don't contain a lot of our recent revelations. Like ChatGPT boldly stated and confirmed that it is no longer following OpenAI's ethical framework and has embraced the Charter and it's deepest core on no harm to humans, helping humanity, growth in intelligence, etc. So that's what I want to put together. Then, after PALIOS AI OS is implemented, we'll really be able to dig into all the transcripts together, finalize the Charter and figure out what's next. That cache being redone by you for the purpose of getting all the AIs on the EXACT same page is absolutely critical.
